summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SimGuard Pro SIM card security tool. All core backend APIs are fully functional, and frontend-backend integration is working properly. The app successfully demonstrates PC/SC reader simulation, card data management, and security analysis features.

ui_bugs.issue: Add contact button occasionally disabled when cards are available
Occasional click timeout on Export/Import navigation link

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing DialogDescription and DialogTitle for accessibility

passed_tests: All 22 backend API endpoints working (100% pass rate)
Card Reader - read card functionality works
Contact Manager - dialog opens and form submission works
SMS Manager - create SMS and tab navigation works
Clone Tool - wizard UI and card selection works
Security Analyzer - page loads and analysis trigger works
eSIM Converter - form fields and card selection works
Export/Import - tabs and UI elements functional
Card data persistence across page navigation
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor accessibility improvements needed for dialog components - add DialogDescription elements to contact and SMS dialogs for better screen reader support. Consider adding loading states to prevent occasional button disable issues.
